subject: Interscholastic Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Alexander, N.D., in the middle of a growth spurt rooted in an oil boom, reinstated its program, as well as boys’ and girls’ basketball and girls’ volleyball, and in doing so, rediscovered its community pride.
snippet: Alexander, N.D., in the middle of a growth spurt rooted in an oil boom, reinstated its program, as well as boys’ and girls’ basketball and girls’ volleyball, and in doing so, rediscovered its community pride.
